name: Cooking & Puzzle
description:
Cook cuisine, Design your restaurant and Match-3!

Experience superb culinary creations, lavish interior design, and daunting Match 3 puzzles!

Introducing Cooking & Puzzle, you'll meet Jenny, a young woman seeking to rebuild her families beautiful restaurant. As you beat brilliant match-3 puzzles, you'll unlock new rooms and objects to turn the family restaurant around!

Watch as you build your customer base, meet new friends and old family all while cooking delicious dishes and decorating to your heart's desire!

On the way, you'll find out just who Jenny is, along with all of her friends and family! In the process, you too will become a member of this close-knit community! Join us!

In this game, you will find:

- Matching and swapping cute blocks to decorate your restaurant innovatively!
- Countless room design options and DIY decorations!
- Cleverly crafted match-3 levels!
- Unique boosters and explosive combinations!
- An exciting story with endlessly interesting characters!
- Playable on and offline!
- Free to play with payment options!

The kitchen has never been this exciting! Cook, fry, and grill your way towards unlocking secrets and entertaining customers! These puzzles will challenge you! Serve up hot dishes or get served! Just remember that no restaurateur has one single 'recipe for success! Prepare to dig in, Bon Appétit!

Note: Although some in game items can be purchased with real money, this game is free to play.
